byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

snippet: COPENHAGEN, Denmark, April 2--Prime Minister Chamberlain's speech in the House of Commons today met with reservations and caused some anxiety in Scandinavia....

headline.main: SCANDINAVIANS FEAR 'IN-BETWEEN POSITION'; View Chamberlain Speech With Reservations and Anxiety

lead_paragraph: COPENHAGEN, Denmark, April 2--Prime Minister Chamberlain's speech in the House of Commons today met with reservations and caused some anxiety in Scandinavia.
